mapper.select: SELECT c.ID as id, c.NOMBRE as nombre, c.DESCRIPCION as descripcion, c.FECHACREACION as fCreacion , c.ESTADO as estado , c.FECHAMODIFICACION as fModificacion FROM CATEGORIA as c
SELECT c.ID as id, c.NOMBRE as nombre, c.DESCRIPCION as descripcion, c.FECHACREACION as fCreacion , c.ESTADO as estado , c.FECHAMODIFICACION as fModificacion FROM CATEGORIA as c WHERE c.ID = #{id};

SELECT c.ID as id, c.NOMBRE as nombre, c.DESCRIPCION as descripcion, c.FECHACREACION as fCreacion , c.ESTADO as estado, c.FECHAMODIFICACION as fModificacion FROM CATEGORIA as c WHERE c.NOMBRE = #{nombre};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Categoria (ID, NOMBRE, DESCRIPCION, FECHACREACION, ESTADO) VALUES (#{nombre},#{descripcion});
mapper.update: UPDATE CATEGORIA as c SET c.NOMBRE = #{nombre}, c.DESCRIPCION = #{descripcion}, c.ESTADO = #{estado}, c.FECHAMODIFICACION = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE c.ID = #{id};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CATEGORIA as c WHERE c.ID = #{id};
